The tagger is specifically tuned for biomedical text such as MEDLINE abstracts. ;2013-02-15
name: 3484ae72-1127-5cca-881c-4f7d815f5f6b
notes: The GENIA tagger analyzes English sentences and outputs the base forms, part-of-speech tags, chunk tags, and named entity tags. The tagger is specifically tuned for biomedical text such as MEDLINE abstracts.
title: GENIA Tagger
